remarks: The set of lattice dilations for a fiducial co-atom ` W ` . (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.)
statement:
ldilset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ldilset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ldilset.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ldilset.i $e |- I = ( LAut ` K ) $.
ldilset.d $e |- D = ( ( LDil ` K ) ` W ) $.
ldilset $p |- ( ( K e. C /\ W e. H ) -> D = { f e. I | A. x e. B ( x .<_ W -> ( f ` x ) = x ) } ) $.
$d B x $.
$d I f $.
$d K f x $.
$d W f x $.
